data.text: Where is this in relatable terms for the geographically challenged? @fakelukeanderson
@jhtmontana near West Yellowstone. Google search for mile to sheep Henry lake mountains.

caption.text: #tbt to riding some #endangeredsingletrack with @lady_loam in the #henrylakemountains. Unfortunately much of this area is proposed Wilderness and may not be available to #mountainbikes in the near future. Support the #sustainabletrailscoalition in their efforts to keep these #backcountry #epics open.

I love fall riding on remote backcountry trails in the high country. Let's hope the Forest Service lets us continue to access these challenging and wonderful trails on bicycles. #tbt to last Saturday. 
#10LakesMontana #endangeredsingletrack #sustainabletrailscoalition #wildernessculture #bikesbelong #montanamoment #whitefishrange #vsco #vscocam #flatheadfattires #flatheadphotography #mtb #montanawinseverytime #campvibes #cyclingcameraclub #outsideisfree #neverstopexploring #adventure

data.text: 10 Lakes north of Whitefish near the boarder. Big rides to do up there @lockefromtheforest and it's all on the chopping block to ban bikes.
Damn....thank you. Bucket list just got bigger.  Such a rough year.

caption.text:
Riding bikes on big backcountry trails over several passes in a day.

data.text: I hate you but I love you.  Sick shot

caption.text:
All that climbing and hike-a-biking pays off when you drop off the other side of the pass.
#10LakesMontana #exploremontana #montanatrails #montanamoment #earnyourturns #wildernessculture #wheremybiketookme #goldenhour #sustainabletrailscoalition #neverstopexploring #vscocam #vsco #mtblove #mountainbike #endangeredsingletrack

Dropping off Wolverine Pass into Paradise Basin in 10 Lakes Montana. 
The bicycle is a legitimate form of backcountry travel and shouldn't be excluded from far away wild places like this. 
Let's keep it open and inclusive to all human powered users.

Ten Lakes Montana. Big rides with lots of vert, amazing views, and fun trails.

Fall alpine riding in northern Montana is really hard to beat.
Go ride #10LakesMontana near Eureka now because they are trying to shut us out.

#alpine #singletrack #rideallday #bikeMontana #bikesbelong #endangeredsingletrack #fallriding  #wildwithoutwilderness #heybear #flatheadfattires #flatheadphotography #ridebikeswithyourfriends #adventure

Fall riding in the #Montana #backcountry. #10LakesMontana trails are on the chopping block. Sadly the travel plan is going to close 70 odd miles of amazing wild and rugged trail. #endangeredsingletrack in the #whitefishrange.

The bicycle is a legitimate low impact form of backcountry travel. @imba_us #sos <><><><><><><><><><><><><>

Perfect late summer ride in the Ten Lakes Scenic Area outside of Eureka. Check it out now it now because the proposed Travel Plan recommends cutting trails open to bikes to 16.4 miles from about 86 miles.  #tenlakesmontana #montanamoment #montanawinseverytime #flatheadfattires #larchvibes @bikemag

Today marks 13 years of marriage and adventures large and small with @kellyrobrien. 
Here is a pic from a exploration ride up Moose Mtn in the #whitefishrange. Even though it is hard to get to and hard to ride, it will be sad to lose access to this kind of trail to #explore via #bicycle. 
#bikesbelong #RideItNow #realwomenthatride #sustainabletrailscoalition #vscocam #vsco #adventureride #exploremontana #backcountry #mtb #singletrack #EveryTrailConnects

When riding through a nice huckleberry patch on a unusually bad year for berries you not only stop frequently, you try to ride one handed and grab them on the go. Batting average is below 50%

#explorewhitefish #montanatrails #humanpowered #eatlocal #mtb #EndangeredSingletrack #deepcreek #mountainbike #vscocam #vsco #huckleberry

Deep Creek in the #whitefishrange is my favorite loop right now. It's a #wild #backcountry ride with tons of options to make it longer if you have time. Main loop is 9.5 miles with 2600' of climbing. The 5 mile drop down the North Fork of Deep Creek a blast. #RideItNow because the Forest Service  plans to ban bikes from this remote #notWilderness trail. Time for @imba_us to step up and help #Montana and our #montanatrails 
Thanks for the pic @cmcorah

Tuchuck Mountain looking like it might as well be on Mars after a nasty climb up to Thoma Lookout in the #whitefishrange. Went plum crazy riding so much trail on Trail Bender '15 with @ben7parsons and a couple a old timers up near the border eh! #outforaripareyabud #trailbender #endangeredsingletrack #ridebikeswithyourfriends #type2fun #summertime #adventuretime #puglife
